message:
Iran: They are looking into whether Israel's collaborators eliminated Haniyeh

Amir Hossein Rahimi, the assistant to the head of the judiciary in Iran announced that the Attorney General has ordered the arrest of anyone who "behaved negligently" in the issue of the assassination of Ismail Haniyeh.

Rahimi also added:
"We have no doubt that the Zionist entity is the one who committed the crime, but we are examining whether it committed the crime directly or through accomplices on its behalf."

USA: One of Hamas' "successes" was a small demonstration in Brooklyn by an organization for blacks and Palestinians in which Hamas flags were raised and a comparison was made between the assassination of Haniyeh and the death of Sonya Massey, an African-American woman who was shot in her home by an American police officer about a month ago. Representatives of Neturi Karta also arrived for a demonstration.

"Where are the Arab leaders?"

"The events of Ismail Haniyeh" - the funeral, the Day of Rage and the World Day for Gaza are marked as a failure....
Criticism is being directed on social media towards the leaders of Arab countries who did not attend Haniyeh's funeral in Qatar (except for the ruler of Qatar - seen in the attached photo).
Criticism of Abu Mazen who was present at Shimon Peres' funeral in Jerusalem but did not come to Haniyeh's funeral.
The Day of Rage and the Day for Gaza announced by Hamas failed to bring the number of demonstrators to the streets that Hamas had expected - this is another top leader in their view who was killed in the war...
There was a disappointment...

The Palestinians report 16 deaths in three attacks by the IDF tonight in the Gaza Strip

The Palestinians report 5 dead and 15 wounded in a third attack of its kind in the area of ​​the displaced persons' tents inside the Shuhada Al-Aqsa hospital complex in Deir al-Balah in the center of the Gaza Strip. The tents caught fire (documentation attached).

As the Palestinians report on 3 deaths in the attack on the house of the Abdullah Hasnat family in the area of ​​the camp west of Deir al-Balah (Abdullah's wife and son were killed).

Palestinian channels also report that in the north of the Gaza Strip, 8 were killed tonight as a result of the attack on the house of the Amudi family in the Fakhoura area of ​​Jabaliya.

After Hamas officially accepted yesterday 👆 responsibility for the attack in which Amnon Mukhtar was murdered on June 22 in Qalqilya, by its operatives: Jamal Abu Haniyeh and Ali Khalil (Abu Bakr), the Islamic Jihad releases a video in which the two terrorists attributed to the attack are seen wearing Islamic Jihad headbands and officially announce that they are Islamic Jihad men.

In doing so, the Islamic Jihad humiliated Hamas and showed that the publications of its military arm yesterday were false.

IDF spokesperson:

A soldier from the 9th Battalion, 'Akvot Barzel' formation (401), was seriously injured yesterday (Saturday), in a battle in the southern Gaza Strip.

The soldier was referred for medical treatment and his family was informed.

##
The military wing of Hamas accepted responsibility for the incident.
MDA: 4 injured in a stabbing attack in Holon, two of them in critical condition and one in serious condition.
